question: 台所
sourceMnemonic: What <kanji>place</kanji> in your house has most of the <kanji>machine</kanji>s in it? Your <vocabulary>kitchen</vocabulary>! Just think about it. Refrigerator, freezer, dishwasher, stove, microwave, WOW! That's so many. The kitchen definitely has the most machines.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This word consists of the on'yomi reading for <ja>台</ja> and the kun'yomi reading for <ja>所</ja>. You've learned them both so as long as you remember the rendaku, you should be able to read this word too!
